COULD_YOU_REPEAT_THE_ORIGINAL_REQUEST.message: 基の要請をもう一回行ってくれないか?

DENY_0.message: I'm sorry, but I don't think I could trust you with my safety.

DENY_1.message: ふさわしい能力を身につけたら戻ってきてください。

DENY_2.message: I don't think you're the pilot I'm looking for.

DENY_3.message: You don't look like someone capable of transporting people.

DENY_4.message: You're not the kind of pilot I'm looking for.

DENY_5.message: You seem much too inexperienced to handle a transport of this importance.

DENY_6.message: I have never heard of you. I need someone experienced for this journey.

DENY_7.message: I'm not willing to risk my life on someone without any qualifications like you.

FLAVOUR_0_ADTEXT.message: Wanted: Passage for a small group to {system} system. Will pay {cash}.

FLAVOUR_0_FAILUREMSG.message: Unacceptable! You took forever. We are not willing to pay you.

FLAVOUR_0_INTROTEXT.message: Hi, I'm {name} and I need passage for a small group to {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, a distance of {dist} ly. I will pay {cash}.

FLAVOUR_0_SUCCESSMSG.message: Thank you for the nice trip. You have been paid in full.

FLAVOUR_0_WHEREAREWE.message: Where are we? We've waited enough - take us to the nearest station NOW!

FLAVOUR_10_ADTEXT.message: VIP needs urgent passage on a fast ship to {system} system. No questions asked.

FLAVOUR_10_DANGER.message: I think someone is following me.

FLAVOUR_10_FAILUREMSG.message: You are such an inexperienced pilot. I'm not going to pay for this.

FLAVOUR_10_INTROTEXT.message: My name is {name}. I want fast passage to {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, a distance of {dist} ly. Paying {cash}.

FLAVOUR_10_SUCCESSMSG.message: Thank you for the fast ride. You have been paid in full.

FLAVOUR_10_WHEREAREWE.message: Where are we? I've waited enough - take me to the nearest station NOW!

FLAVOUR_10_WHYSOMUCH.message: I would rather someone didn't find me.

FLAVOUR_11_ADTEXT.message: Corporate inspector needs passage on a fast ship to {system} system.

FLAVOUR_11_DANGER.message: Sometimes people don't want to be inspected.

FLAVOUR_11_FAILUREMSG.message: I'm going to lose my job because of your incompetence. So I need that money more than you.

FLAVOUR_11_INTROTEXT.message: My name is {name}. I need fast passage to {system} ({sectorx}, {sectory}, {sectorz}) system, a distance of {dist} ly. Will pay {cash}.

FLAVOUR_11_SUCCESSMSG.message: Thank you for the fast ride. You have been paid in full.

FLAVOUR_11_WHEREAREWE.message: Where are we? I've waited enough - take me to the nearest station NOW!

FLAVOUR_11_WHYSOMUCH.message: I'm a factory inspector doing my rounds.

FLAVOUR_12_ADTEXT.message: Urgent transport required for fleeing citizen. Passage to {system} system needed.
